game.name: Narcotics Ops Command
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into the boots of an elite operative in Narcotics Ops Command. Battle ruthless cartels, uncover dark conspiracies, and survive intense missions in this realistic tactical FPS. Every mission counts. Every bullet matters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the boots of an elite operative in Narcotics Ops Command. Battle ruthless cartels, uncover dark conspiracies, and survive intense missions in this realistic tactical FPS. Every mission counts. Every bullet matters.
